meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lara Brenckle Malmont Sirena Terr Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6843.

td.p: Lara Brenckle Malmont, a strategic communications lead from Carlisle, Pennsylvania
Sirena Terr, a business lawyer and consultant from Livingston, New Jersey
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 12-day cash winnings total $245,610)

tr.td: LETTERS TO CANADA
THE HAIR APPARENT
SKYDIVING
FAMOUS WOMEN
THE HEISMAN WINNER'S SCHOOL
"E" FOLLOWS "D"
